author: iliarashev
title: Visualized Cardano Structure
description: We should SEE where we fit in a structure to integrate faster. New members don’t SEE it and feel lost. They take average 8 weeks to onboard.

author: murdocisgod
title: member onboarding gamer recruitment
description: Cardano needs new members. A fun game game will onboard gamers as members.

author: headelf
title: CATS Community Advisor Triage Sys.
description: The current system is difficult to navigate & onboard for newbs and the system is not designed to quickly scale for an increase in proposals

author: robinnagpal.tiet
title: DoDAO.io - Onboarding Platform
description: Members joining crypto projects/DAOs feel lost and are not able to contribute as they don't have basic information needed to participate.

author: anilla
title: Grow SA Cardano Community
description: When one hears of catalyst, it is hard to know how to get involved as the tsumani of info available is overwhelming and delays participation

author: defidiscussions
title: Cardano Network Expansion in Brazil
description: Awareness of Cardano's projects and vision could stand to be improved among investors, young people, and community leaders in Brazil.

author: lennext
title: Learn 2 Earn, CA Can Be a Good Job!
description: Many talented people w/ skills, lack opportunities to earn. Homemakers are looking for a way to earn. Struggling to support their families.

author: ayaxlabombarda
title: Innovatio's Digital User Onboarding
description: There are no on-boarding methods for entrepreneurs or early-adopters accustomed to digital channels for successful Catalyst adoption.

author: sustainableada
title: Onboarding Under-represented Youth
description: Absence of a Cardano youth program focused on transformative education in the community, equipping youth with 21st century skills

author: shirogat
title: Onboard New Eastern African Members
description: Much as catalyst is an active growing community more needs to be done to increase awareness of project Catalyst especially in East Africa

author: akyar.ozgur
title: Organised Linkedin of professionals
description: Lack of awareness of Cardano and Project Catalyst as the most active open innovation platform among professionals.

author: dzhuliana
title: Automated mentor-matching tool
description: New members encounter a steep learning curve to understand where they fit and how they can add value and knowledge is not efficiently shared

author: harryha6789
title: New Catalyst operation pattern
description: Project Catalyst is currently complex, slow, not user-friendly, not optimized resources (time & talent), and inefficient assessments.

author: ditcameroon
title: On-boarding French Developers
description:
--
Haskell and Cryptocurrencies Mongolia 2020 course, Plutus and Atala Prism pioneer programs material (Video/Docs) lack a French version.

author: alexp7
title: New Members Engagement 2- AIM
description: New members/mentors wish to support Catalyst but it is time-consuming and complex to learn how to best engage.

author: cardanopoolpeek1
title: Fair Stake Pool Economy
description: Many sites priorities ranking over other metrics for pool selection, paid for advertising or methods for SPO's to attract new delegation.

author: vilela
title: Cardano for Corporate ₳ctivation
description: How might we engage software engineering companies to use their State Of The Art Technologies to improve Cardano Ecosystem?

author: gilvania
title: Evangelizing Catalyst to Academics
description: Professors, researchers, and students in Academia need to hear about Catalyst, and learn how to submit proposals and become an active member

author: ldjatsa
title: French West Africa Outreach
description: There is no Cardano community in the French West Africa. People lack awareness of the blockchain solutions. Cardano could gain more grounds.

author: fractalfuzion
title: Free CNFT Giveaway Bonanza - Get In
description: Cardano needs to onboard new users to the platform. The best way to achieve this is through a Giant CNFT giveaway bonanza. its Free CNFTs!

author: jessec
title: Project Catalyst Onboarding Hub
description: Project Catalyst lacks an engaging community hub with quick effective information to onboard new members.

author: lidonation
title: Content & Insights: Multi-Channel
description: More people must be exposed to the excitement, innovation, & positive community in Catalyst. This will lead to growth & participation!

author: emeliasarfo2
title: Ghana Youth Onboarding Outreach
description: Most of the productive youth in Ghana are not aware of blockchain technology and its opportunities. Cardano can support their onboarding.

author: fhilip.k
title: Cardano Icons for consistent design
description: Cardano and Catalyst need quality unifying open icons.

author: cenkner
title: Cardano learning needs assessment
description: New users in Cardano have trouble knowing what to learn and where to get help. Resource development and availability tend to be random.

author: sahyounk
title: Dubai Cardano Meetup
description: Dubai has a large number of young working professionals that are expatriates without pension investment options

author: rhysstoic
title: FreeLoaderz: Load Balancer
description: Running worldwide submit API services (for wallet custom node option) at scale requires adding to our existing routing infrastructure

author: easterntownhall
title: Onboarding East Asia Today
description: Despite a population of billions, East Asia is underrepresented in Catalyst due to a lack of localized content and Townhall participation.

author: easterntownhall
title: Connecting Asian Voter and Proposer
description: Language barriers and cultural differences creates a lack of trust on sources to rely on before and during the voting period.

author: checkpoint
title: Destination CARDANO
description: Blockchain is alien, scary and misunderstood to those that aren't involved.

author: tevosaks
title: Innovation Fund Research - Roles
description: We lack an overview of interactions in different funding stages and between each of the roles

author: cole.vt
title: Onboard Impact Driven Businesses
description: Businesses look to be onboarded to the blockchain with sustainable practices however, there is not an avenue to reach Cardano’s potential.

author: cardano4climate
title: Onboarding through events
description: It is difficult and overwhelming for newcomers to navigate the different areas of Catalyst and wind up overwhelmed and unsure where to start

author: felixweber
title: After Town Hall by Catalyst Swarm
description: The Catalyst/Cardano Community needs open spaces to have fast and safe onboarding experiences and to encourage discourse and participation.

author: cardano4climate
title: The Impact Onboarding
description: It is difficult and overwhelming for newcomers to find their way within Catalyst.

author: nftspeakeazy
title: NFT Speakeazy Onboarding Bar
description: All of us have at least one loved one or close friend that has worked in the hospitality industry. That community and ours needs to meet.

author: victorcorcino
title: The Catalyst School Fund9 Operation
description: Proposers, Advisors, Voters and other Catalyst members still struggle to understand how Catalyst works and how to play their roles.

author: easterntownhall
title: Eastern Catalyst School
description: Eastern Hemisphere has many non-English speakers, to onboard Eastern Hemisphere to Catalyst we need a system that caters to their languages.

author: tevosaks
title: Mini Proposal Workshops
description: Proposers don't have the experience to make their proposals understandable for voters

author: daynavision
title: FIAT 1ST HOT WALLET Method
description: General public blockchain recruiting still has many barriers to entry.
